summary: A Skimpier Elven Armor for Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set. Skimpier, but non-nude.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a simple texture for Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set for female elven armor. It\'s skimpier but non-nude. All it does is set some of the textures to invisible so that more skin is exposed. It\'s my first ever mod and unfortunately I still don\'t understand Blender enough to create this as a proper mesh. Therefore, there are a lot of limitations... for example the armor doesn\'t cast shadows on the wearer properly.

If I were a proper modder, I\'d have created a brand new mesh and a high definition texture for this with a longer skirt and more detail on the bra. But I\'m afraid that is well beyond my abilities at the moment.

The only reason I\'m uploading this is because there are so few mods for CBBE right now and some of you might enjoy this. It\'s something to use until a real modder comes up with something better.

Instructions
----------------
Just extract the file into your Data directory as per usual.
Obviously, this requires Caliente\'s Big Bottom Edition mod (CBBE) and Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set to have been installed first. It doesn\'t overwrite any of those files.

Use it as you see fit.
author: MrMiggins
